entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Three Hills
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 10. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High 14.
